testcase.name: TC13 coklu window testi
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "webUniUrl" anasayfaya gider................................passed Then Login Portal a kadar asagi iner.......................................passed And Login Portal a tiklar...................................................passed Then Diger window'a gecer...................................................passed And username ve password kutularina faker ile deger yazdirir...............passed And webUni login butonuna basar.............................................passed Then Popup'ta cikan yazinin validation failed oldugunu test eder............passed And Ok diyerek Popup'i kapatir..............................................passed When Ilk sayfaya geri doner.................................................passed Then Ilk sayfaya donuldugunu test eder......................................passed And sayfayi kapatir.........................................................passed
